Uses of Package
com.sri.ai.grinder.theory.differencearithmetic

  • Packages that use com.sri.ai.grinder.theory.differencearithmetic 
    Package Description
    com.sri.ai.grinder.theory.differencearithmetic  
  • Classes in com.sri.ai.grinder.theory.differencearithmetic used by com.sri.ai.grinder.theory.differencearithmetic 
    Class and Description
    AbstractSingleVariableDifferenceArithmeticConstraintFeasibilityRegionStepSolver
    A AbstractSingleVariableNumericConstraintFeasibilityRegionStepSolver for a SingleVariableDifferenceArithmeticConstraint.
    DifferenceArithmeticLiteralSide
    A specialized Expression representation of a difference arithmetic literal side (valid of the other side is zero) that provides the positive, negative and constant terms in it.
    DifferenceArithmeticLiteralSide.DifferenceArithmeticLiteralSideException 
    DifferenceArithmeticLiteralSide.DuplicateTermException
    An error during the construction of a DifferenceArithmeticLiteralSide indicating that a term is duplicate (with the same sign), thus making the given expression impossible to represent as a DifferenceArithmeticLiteralSide because the term needs to be multiplied by a constant.
    DifferenceArithmeticLiteralSide.InvalidLiteralException
    An error indicating that an expression is not a different arithmetic literal.
    DifferenceArithmeticTheory
    A Theory for difference arithmetic literals, with quantifier elimination over polynomials.
    ModelCountingOfSingleVariableDifferenceArithmeticConstraintStepSolver
    A AbstractSingleVariableDifferenceArithmeticConstraintFeasibilityRegionStepSolver computing the number of values for the variable satisfying the constraints.
    RangeAndExceptionsSet
    An interface representing a set of integers by keeping the symbolic extremes of an aboveAndUpTo and a set of expressions in the aboveAndUpTo but not in the denoted set.
    SatisfiabilityOfSingleVariableDifferenceArithmeticConstraintStepSolver
    A AbstractBooleanWithPropagatedLiteralsRequiringPropagatedLiteralsAndCNFToBeSatisfiedStepSolver for a SingleVariableLinearRealArithmeticConstraint.
    SingleVariableDifferenceArithmeticConstraint
    A difference arithmetic single-variable constraint solver.
    SummationOnDifferenceArithmeticAndPolynomialStepSolver
    A step solver for a summation with an integer index constrained by difference arithmetic literals, over a polynomial on integers.
    ValuesOfSingleVariableDifferenceArithmeticConstraintStepSolver
    A step solver computing the possible values of the variable of a single-variable difference arithmetic constraint.
